title: FS: 1920 Fenway RPPC w/ Harry Hopper
author: Bicem

posts.post_title: FS: 1920 Fenway RPPC w/ Harry Hopper
posts.post_content:
Beautiful real photo postcard showing members of the Boston Red Sox (including HOFer Harry Hooper) against the iconic Fenway interior backdrop.  Some writing but otherwise outstanding condition and image clarity.

$475

[IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/bicem/dienes/autographs/large/PXL_20210403_171336345.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/bicem/dienes/autographs/large/PXL_20210403_171345634.jpg[/IMG]
bump for price reduction before consignment
